practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Corporate Bankruptcy|Real Estate Law|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Medical Malpractice|Workers Compensation|Social Security Disability|Trucking Accidents
description:
While some accidents may be unavoidable, a preventable injury sustained due to someone else's negligence should never happen. At Spence | Custer Attorneys at Law in Johnstown, Pennsylvania, we seek full and fair compensation from those who cause harm out of careless or reckless behavior.

Whether negotiating with insurance companies or seeking justice in court through litigation and appeals, our law firm team is dedicated to fighting for our clients' rights. Personal injury and wrongful death cases we handle include the following:

• Car, truck, motorcycle and commercial vehicle accidents
• Dangerous property conditions
• Medical malpractice
• Defective products
• Animal bites

No workplace is completely safe, but workers' compensation insurance and Social Security Disability Insurance are programs in place to help cover the financial burden of an injury or illness. We have a thorough understanding of how to file a successful claim for benefits. People can come to our law firm for assistance with paperwork, documentation and representation in hearings and appeals.

Our law firm also takes cases involving personal and corporate bankruptcy, real estate law, employment law and estate planning. Spence | Custer Attorneys at Law invites people to bring their stories to us in person and through virtual appointments. The first visit is free, and we accept credit card payments.

Spence | Custer Attorneys at Law is a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
